titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2216) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-149, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2216 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 57.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 204.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/19/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2216 (FY 2001 supplemental appropriations).
